Driving Financial Inclusion Across Zambia

We deploy, train, and manage field forces that bridge the gap between financial services and communities nationwide.

Our Story

Eastlux was founded with a singular vision: to democratize access to financial services across Zambia by building and managing the most capable field force network in the region.

Today, we operate across 15+ districts in 5 provinces, with over 200 trained Direct Sales Agents (DSAs) delivering exceptional results for our clients. From agency banking to trade development, we enable businesses to reach underserved communities and drive meaningful economic impact.

Our core expertise spans Trade Development, Agency Banking, Call Center Operations, and Project Management — all designed to help businesses scale efficiently and sustainably.

What Drives Us

Our mission, vision, and values guide everything we do.

Our Mission

To deploy and manage world-class field forces that drive financial inclusion, expand market reach, and deliver measurable business outcomes for our clients.

Our Vision

To be Zambia's leading field force management partner, recognized for excellence in agent deployment, training, and performance optimization.

Our Values

Integrity • Excellence • Innovation • Accountability • Collaboration • Impact

Why Choose Eastlux?

We don't just provide agents — we deliver strategic field force solutions that drive real business results.

Trained & Certified DSAs

200+ agents rigorously trained in customer service, compliance, and product knowledge.

Rapid Deployment

Average onboarding time of just 48 hours — get your field force active fast.

Compliance & Security

Full KYC/AML compliance and security protocols to protect your brand reputation.

Proven Track Record

85% client retention rate and consistent performance across 40+ client engagements.

Quality Assurance

Ongoing training, performance monitoring, and quality control systems.

End-to-End Management

From recruitment to training to deployment — we handle everything.
